data.text: They are worth every penny. I use them for touring as well as for work (London Cycle Courier). Wouldnt trust any other mount, never fallen off. Saying that the waterproof shell you can buy isn't waterproof, its shower proof but not great in prolonged rain.

data.text: My phone popped out on day 2 of a 20 day bicycle tour. I didn‚Äôt realize it wasn‚Äôt clicked in correctly. Fortunately the oncoming truck tires straddled the phone! You need to make sure it is properly secured. I later rearranged the cockpit so I could get the phone in and out easier. Otherwise, works great.
data.author: John Goldman

data.text: Yep. Using the out front mount with the optional GoPro attachment, which I mainly use to attach a headlight conveniently.
data.author: Dave Henderson

data.text: Like everyone else said or at least most everyone, they're great. Never had an issue mountain biking or touring. Instead of getting their phone specific case, I recommend getting a case with a PC back and the universal adapter. Their TPU cases will flex and eventually tear. I usually get a Ringke case off Amazon.

data.author: Tony De Jesus

data.text: Replaced my Ram mounts (after 12 years or so) , as my latest phone stopped working, now only using quadlock and its dampeners on my friiends recommedation.
data.author: Christian Tydecks

data.text: Yes and they are perfect!
data.author: Sue Chapple

data.text: I'm glad to read here that others who ride rough terrain have not seen their Quad Lock fail. I have not seen mine fail. I use QL Out Front Pro near the tip of my aero bars to get the phone into a position where I can watch the road ahead and see the phone too. In my car I use a QL mount with wireless charging head. At home the QL case allows wireless charging, but not at fastest charging speed. When running I use a QL arm band mount. When shopping for a phone I only consider phones with QL case available, although it was interesting to read here that the Universal case mount works reliably.
data.author: David Markun

data.text: Had quadlock switched to cheap AliExpress version. Same shit. Quadlock is ok but so overpriced.
